item.title: How do I add objects?
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

this is surprisingly more easy than it sounds =P
search this

    public void NewObjects() {

the whole thing should look like this

[code] public void NewObjects() {

    makeGlobalObject(CORDX, CORDY, OBJECT ID, 0, 10); //COMMENT HERE [/code]

the CORDX is the x cord of ware you want the object to be the CORDY is the cord y ware you want the object to be OBJECT ID is the object you want to add’s id the 0 is the face ( 0=west -1= north -2=east -3-south …notice the numbers 1-3 are negative…) and the 10 is the item type (0-3 is wall object 4-8 is wall decoration 9 is diag. walls and 10-11 is world objects [such as bank booths or trees]) the // means comment witch basicly you dont have to add it just helps you orginaize =P hope this helped

Read full topic
